00020 class Database {
00021         
00028         protected static $driver;
00029         
00037         protected static $queries = array();
00038         
00047         public static $debugging = false;
00048         
00058         protected static function setDriver($driverName) {
00059                 
00060                 $driverName = '\MVCWebComponents\Database\\' . Inflector::camelize($driverName);
00061                 if(!class_exists($driverName) or !in_array('MVCWebComponents\Database\DatabaseDriverInterface', class_implements($driverName))) throw new InvalidDriverException($driverName);
00062                 self::$driver = new $driverName;
00063                 
00064         }
00065         
00078         public static function connect($driverName, $options = array()) {
00079                 
00080                 if(!is_string($driverName)) throw new BadArgumentException("Database::connect() expects parameter 1 to be a string, '" . gettype($driverName) . "' given.");
00081                 if(!is_array($options)) throw new BadArgumentException("Database::connect() expects parameter 2 to be an array, '" . gettype($options) . "' given.");
00082                 
00083                 self::setDriver($driverName);
00084                 if(!self::$driver->connect($options)) throw new DatabaseConnectionException($driverName, self::getError());
00085                 return true;
00086                 
00087         }
00088         
00099         public static function query($sql) {
00100                 
00101                 if(!is_object(self::$driver)) throw new NoConnectionException('query');
00102                 
00103                 self::$queries[] = array();
00104                 $query =& self::$queries[count(self::$queries) - 1];
00105                 $query['sql'] = $sql;
00106                 $query['insert_id'] = false;
00107                 $query['num_result_rows'] = false;
00108                 $query['num_affected_rows'] = false;
00109                 $query['error'] = false;
00110                 $query['time'] = 0;
00111                 
00112                 $start = microtime(true);
00113                 
00114                 if(self::$debugging and in_array(reset(explode(' ', $sql)), array('insert', 'update', 'delete'))) echo "$sql\n";
00115                 elseif(!self::$driver->query($sql)) throw new BadQueryException($sql, self::getError());
00116                 
00117                 $query['insert_id'] = self::getInsertId();
00118                 $query['num_result_rows'] = self::getNumResultRows();
00119                 $query['num_affected_rows'] = self::getNumAffectedRows();
00120                 $query['time'] = microtime(true) - $start;
00121                 return true;
00122                 
00123         }
00124         
00136         public static function getRow($type = 'object') {
00137                 
00138                 if(!is_object(self::$driver)) throw new NoConnectionException('query');
00139                 
00140                 if($type == 'array') return self::$driver->getArray();
00141                 elseif($type == 'object') return self::$driver->getObject();
00142                 else {
00143                         if(is_string($type) and class_exists($type)) return self::$driver->getObject($type);
00144                         elseif(is_array($type) and isset($type[0]) and isset($type[1]) and is_string($type[0]) and is_array($type[1])) return self::$driver->getObject($type[0], $type[1]);
00145                         else throw new BadArgumentException("Database::getRow() expects parameter 1 to be 'object', 'array', 'className' or array('className', array params), '" . print_r($type, true) . "' given.");
00146                 }
00147                 
00148                 return false;
00149                 
00150         }
00151         
00160         public static function getAll($type = 'object') {
00161                 
00162                 if(!is_object(self::$driver)) throw new NoConnectionException('query');
00163                 
00164                 $return = array();
00165                 self::rewind();
00166                 while($row = self::getRow($type)) $return[] = $row;
00167                 return $return;
00168                 
00169         }
00170         
00178         public static function rewind() {
00179                 
00180                 if(!is_object(self::$driver)) throw new NoConnectionException('query');
00181                 
00182                 self::$driver->rewind();
00183                 
00184         }
00185         
00193         public static function getError() {
00194                 
00195                 if(!is_object(self::$driver)) throw new NoConnectionException('query');
00196                 
00197                 return self::$driver->getError();
00198                 
00199         }
00200

00209                 
00210                 if(!is_object(self::$driver)) throw new NoConnectionException('query');

00286         
00294         public function __construct($driverName) {
00295
